wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Jacob Haines (born 28 October 1998) is an English cricketer who plays for Sussex County Cricket Club. He is a left-handed batsman who also bowls right-arm medium pace.

response: |style="text-align:center"|20|| Tom Haines* ||  ||  || Left-handed || Right-arm medium || List A captain

In July 2021, in  Lancashire's match against Kent, James Anderson took his 1,000th first-class wicket. In September 2021, Tom Haines became the first batsman to score 1,000 runs in this edition of the Championship.
